content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "gravel", "quantity": 55, "index": 12}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 31}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a jungle_pressure_plate, I need to place two jungle_planks next to each other in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one plank from slot 32 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 55, "index": 12}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 31}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: I have already placed one plank in slot 1, so I need to place another plank to the right of it. Therefore, I will move the second plank from slot 32 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 55, "index": 12}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 31}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: The pressure plate has been crafted, so I need to move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
